sentences.sContent: At least nine out of ten Mexicans are baptized Catholics.
sentences.sCn: 至少十分之九的墨西哥人是受过洗礼的天主教徒。

phrases.pCn: 天主教；天主教会；天主教堂；大公教会
罗马天主教的；天主教会的；天主教徒
罗马天主教会；罗马公教

trans.tranOther: The Catholic Church is the branch of the Christian Church that accepts the Pope as its leader and is based in the Vatican in Rome
A Catholic is a member of the Catholic Church
